lead_paragraph: In the end, it was a tale of two Games. The yin and yang Olympics, one of stark contrasts between the feats on the field of play, and regrettable actions off it.

headline.main: More Carnival Than Clockwork, but Rio Pulls It Off
headline.print_headline: More Carnival Than Clockwork, but Rio Pulls It Off
